NK080(wu)004:1: // la shan lta ba'i sgron me'i bsdus don bzhugs //
NK080(wu)004:2: slob dpon bzhad pa rdo rjes mdzad pa'i la shan lta ba'i sgron ma 'di la don bzhi ste /
NK080(wu)004:4: gnyis bsdus bshad par dam bca' ba dang /
NK080(wu)004:10: gdul bya lam gyi snang ba dang /
NK080(wu)004:11: bde bar gshegs pa'i snang ba'o //
NK080(wu)004:13: 'khor 'das lhun grub tu bstan pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:14: 'khor ba 'khor 'das tha snyad las grol bar bstan pa'o //
NK080(wu)004:19: dngos po lam lhun grub bo //
NK080(wu)004:23: mya ngan las 'das pa la gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:24: snang sogs sku lnga lhun grub dang /
NK080(wu)004:25: ma nor dbyings dang ye shes lhun grub bo //
NK080(wu)004:31: nges tshig go /rkyen la gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:32: nyon mongs lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen /
NK080(wu)004:33: nges pa'i thabs dang bral ba'o //
NK080(wu)004:37: gdul bya'i snang ba la gnyis te //
NK080(wu)004:41: rang bzhin shes dgos ched dang /
NK080(wu)004:45: rang bzhin cha bstan pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:50: lam gyi ngo bo la gsum ste //
NK080(wu)004:52: dka' thub rig byed kyi theg pa dang //
NK080(wu)004:53: dbang bsgyur thabs kyi theg pa'o //
NK080(wu)004:57: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'o //
NK080(wu)004:59: mos pa mu stegs pa sun phyung ba dang //
NK080(wu)004:65: gzhan dag nyan thos sun phyung ba dang //
NK080(wu)004:69: stong pa'i stong pa nyid phyogs gcig bsgom lta ba'i sgrib par bstan pa'o //
NK080(wu)004:70: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:74: phyogs rtogs phyi rol gyi don sun dbyung ba dang /
NK080(wu)004:79: de lta dang po la gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:83: mi gnas sems tsam phyung ba dang /
NK080(wu)004:88: ma byas bden pa gnyis de nyid dang /
NK080(wu)004:89: gzhan du brjod du med pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:90: gang yang dbu ma'i nges tshig go /don dam la gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:91: rnam grangs kyi don dam bsgrub pa'i gtan tshigs dang /
NK080(wu)004:92: 'dus snang gzhan snang rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam mo //
NK080(wu)004:93: dka' thub rig byed kyi theg pa la gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:98: yo ga /dang po la gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:104: dag pas rtogs pa'i yon tan no //
NK080(wu)004:106: dngos kun sgom pa'i thabs dpes bstan pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:107: ye shes yo ga'i lta ba rtogs pas snang stong res mos bsgom pa'o //
NK080(wu)004:114: dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa la gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:118: ma h+aa yo ga pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:127: gnyis med gnyis med stong pa'i phan yon dang bcas pa'o //
NK080(wu)004:128: a nu yo ga la gsum ste /
NK080(wu)004:131: gang zhig lta sgom gyi yon tan no //
NK080(wu)004:133: rjes la kun tu bzang po dang /
NK080(wu)004:134: gang yang kun tu bzang mo dang /
NK080(wu)004:135: rang snang sras bde ba chen po'o //
NK080(wu)004:136: a ti yo ga la gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:146: dngos po'i bdag nyid chen po'i lta ba dang /
NK080(wu)004:147: dngos de ci yang ma yin pa'i lta ba dang /
NK080(wu)004:148: stong pa chen po'i lta ba'o //
NK080(wu)004:150: yul gsal stong pa chen po'i ngo bo dang /
NK080(wu)004:151: gnyis bsdus 'khor rgyu 'dzin pa med na snang ba mi 'gog pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:152: dus gsum dus gsum gyi chos nyid ye shes rang snang du bstan pa'o //
NK080(wu)004:153: lta ba'i gol sa la gsum ste /
NK080(wu)004:154: don dam ma h+aa gol sa la bzla ba dang /
NK080(wu)004:155: bzhi gnyis dbu ma'i gol sa la bzla ba dang /
NK080(wu)004:156: de nyid gol sa thams cad la bzla ba'o //
NK080(wu)004:158: ming bzhi theg pa 'og ma'i ye shes las rdzogs chen 'phags pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:159: kun ye ye shes kyi nges tshig dang /
NK080(wu)004:160: rang byung ye shes kyi rnam grangs dang /
NK080(wu)004:161: yang dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes so //
NK080(wu)004:162: bde bar gshegs pa'i snang ba la drug ste /
NK080(wu)004:163: gang gis 'bras bu so so'i de bzhin du son pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:164: brtags sogs gsal snang thams cad sems nyid la 'du shes dang bral ba dang /
NK080(wu)004:165: rang byung theg pa 'og ma las dpags pa'i sangs rgyas med pa'i che ba dang /
NK080(wu)004:167: ye shes kyi khyad par dang /
NK080(wu)004:169: spyod pa'i khyad par la gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:170: bskal pa'i rdzogs chen gyis ma zin pa'i 'og ma'i spyod pa gol ba dang /
NK080(wu)004:171: dngos drug rdzogs chen gyi bdag gzhan gyi spyod pa la 'dzin pa med pa'o //
NK080(wu)004:172: ye shes kyi khyad par gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:173: dman 'bras theg pa 'og ma pa rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum du 'dod pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:174: mchog gi rdzogs chen pas rang rig pa'i mngon sum du 'dod pa'o //
NK080(wu)004:175: gtan tshig kyi khyad par la gnyis te /
NK080(wu)004:176: de yi 'og ma'i gtan tshig kyis mi rtogs pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:180: tshad ma dang bral ba nyid tshad ma chen po bstan pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:181: des phyir lung gi gtan tshigs dang /
NK080(wu)004:182: ma lus gtan tshigs mdor bstan pa dang /
NK080(wu)004:183: lta sgom rgyas par bshad pa'o //
NK080(wu)004:184: la shan lta ba'i sgron me'i bsdus pa'i don rdzogs so ////
NK080(wu)004:185: 'khrul ba'i snang ba'i sa bcad nang /
NK080(wu)004:188: nyon mongs lhan cig sogs go rim mi 'grig pa snang bas dpyad /
